com.github.dkanellis.fikey.storage

Interface U2fUserStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Initializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Users

    public interface U2fUserStorage
extends Initializable
    An interface which declares the functionality of a user storage. A user storage is used to keep a reference to every user that the website/application will hold. A storage like that must be able to store only one reference of a U2fUser to avoid duplicate users. Also the storage needs to be able to efficiently add a new user and find if a user is part of the storage.
    Author:
    Dimitris Kanellis

      • getFromUsername

        U2fUser getFromUsername(java.lang.String username)
                 throws UserDoesNotExistException
        Uses the given username to search the storage for the particular user.
        Parameters:
        username - the id of the user to search the storage
        Returns:
        the user from the storage
        Throws:
        UserDoesNotExistException - if the user is not found we notify the API user with an exception
